name: Punk Rock Knife Fight
description:
Punk Rock Knife Fight is a simple 8-bit style pixel art game that involves knife fighting. Jump and duck to dodge knives, and stand still to throw them. Try to defeat all 15 enemies! Play for free while the bugs and features are being ironed out!

Controls:

  • Left click - jump
  • Right click - duck
  • Esc - pause the game

Note: this is my first game made with Unity, and I'm looking to publish it on multiple platforms (Steam, iOS, Android, etc.). Before doing that, I'm looking for feedback. Here are some questions I'm looking for answers to:

  • Does this game have potential as a release (assuming a full retail price of $1) on major platforms? (Steam,iOS,Android,etc.)
  • If it does have potential, what needs to be changed to make it something people will purchase on those platforms?
  • What features/changes would you like to see implemented?
  • Would you be interested in a collection of (5 or so) games of this size in one bundle? How much should I charge for it?

Thanks for your feedback, and I hope you enjoy this game!
